Reference

Dataset endpoints

Endpoints accessing datasets (i.e. expression experiments), and their associated properties and files.

getBioc()

Get Bioconductor data structures

getDatasetAnnotations()

Dataset annotations

getDatasetDE()

Get Differential Expression

getDatasetDEA()

Dataset differential analysis

getDatasetData()

Dataset data

getDatasetDesign()

Dataset design

getDatasetPCA()

Datasets pca component expression levels

getDatasetPlatforms()

Dataset platforms

getDatasetResultSets()

getDatasetResultSets

getDatasetSVD()

Dataset SVD information

getDatasetSamples()

Dataset samples

getDatasets()

Datasets

getTidyDataset()

Get Tidy Dataset and Design

searchDatasets()

Dataset search

Platform endpoints

Endpoints accessing platforms, and their associated properties and files.

getPlatformAnnotation()

Get Gemma platform annotations

getPlatformDatasets()

Platform datasets

getPlatformElementGenes()

Platform element genes

getPlatformElements()

Platform elements

getPlatforms()

Platforms

Gene endpoints

Endpoints accessing genes (non taxon-specific). Most endpoints also have a taxon-specific counterpart in the Taxon endpoints.

getGeneEvidence()

Gene evidence

getGeneGO()

Gene goTerms

getGeneLocation()

Gene locations

getGeneProbes()

Gene probes

getGenes()

Genes

Other functions

Remaining endpoints and helper functions.

forgetGemmaMemoised()

Clear Gemma API cache

searchAnnotations()

Annotation search

Asynchronous Requests

Functions used for asynchronous requests.

async()

Create an async function

async_map()

Apply an asynchronous function to each element of a vector

delay()

Delay async computation for the specified time

http_get()

Asynchronous HTTP GET request

http_head()

Asynchronous HTTP HEAD request

synchronise()

Synchronously wrap asynchronous code

when_all()

Deferred value for a set of deferred values

when_some() when_any()

Resolve a deferred as soon as some deferred from a list resolve
